N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6023.3 - Requirements for instructor certification

State Regulations

Each applicant requesting instructor certification
must: (a) possess a high school
diploma or its equivalent; (b) if a
police or peace officer, be employed as such at the time such officer requests
instructor certification and have successfully completed a Municipal Police

Training Council approved Basic Course for Police Officers or Basic Course for

Peace Officers, as appropriate; (c) if not a police or peace officer, be sponsored by his or her employing police
or peace officer agency; and
(d) have successfully completed an instructor development course (IDC) approved by
the commissioner or satisfy the requirements set forth in section
6023.4
of this Part. Notes
